InterfaceDefinition.appinfo: Overview AnisotropyMaterialExtension is an extension for the [PhysicalMaterial](../../shape/physicalmaterial/) and [SpecularGlossinessMaterial](../specularglossinessmaterial/) nodes. For this node to have an effect, add an [EnvironmentLight](../../lighting/environmentlight) node. The AnisotropyMaterialExtension node belongs to the **X_ITE** component and requires at least level **1,** its default container field is *extensions.* It is available from X3D version 4.0 or higher. **Info:** Please note that this node is still **experimental**, i.e. the functionality of this node may change in future versions of X_ITE.

field.name: metadata
field.description: Information about this node can be contained in a [MetadataBoolean](/x_ite/components/core/metadataboolean/), [MetadataDouble](/x_ite/components/core/metadatadouble/), [MetadataFloat](/x_ite/components/core/metadatafloat/), [MetadataInteger](/x_ite/components/core/metadatainteger/), [MetadataString](/x_ite/components/core/metadatastring/) or [MetadataSet](/x_ite/components/core/metadataset/) node.

field.name: anisotropyStrength
field.description: The anisotropy strength. When the anisotropy texture is present, this value is multiplied by the texture's blue channel.

field.name: anisotropyRotation
field.description: The rotation of the anisotropy in tangent, bitangent space, measured in radians counter-clockwise from the tangent. When the anisotropy texture is present, this value provides additional rotation to the vectors in the texture.

field.name: anisotropyTextureMapping
field.description: Input/Output field *anisotropyTextureMapping*.

field.name: anisotropyTexture
field.description: The anisotropy texture. Red and green channels represent the anisotropy direction in tangent, bitangent space to be rotated by the anisotropy rotation. The blue channel contains strength as to be multiplied by the anisotropy strength.

InterfaceDefinition.appinfo: Overview BlendMode controls how pixels of an objects are drawn. Pixels can be drawn using a function that blends the incoming (source) RGBA values with the RGBA values that are already in the frame buffer (the destination values). BlendMode is an X3DAppearanceChildNode node that handles blend operations. The BlendMode node belongs to the **X_ITE** component and its default container field is *blendMode.* It is available in X_ITE. **Info:** Please note that this node is still **experimental**, i.e. the functionality of this node may change in future versions of X_ITE.

field.name: metadata
field.description: Information about this node can be contained in a [MetadataBoolean](/x_ite/components/core/metadataboolean/), [MetadataDouble](/x_ite/components/core/metadatadouble/), [MetadataFloat](/x_ite/components/core/metadatafloat/), [MetadataInteger](/x_ite/components/core/metadatainteger/), [MetadataString](/x_ite/components/core/metadatastring/) or [MetadataSet](/x_ite/components/core/metadataset/) node.

field.name: blendColor
field.description: The *blendColor* may be used to calculate the source and destination blending factors.

field.name: sourceColorFactor
field.description: Specifies how the red, green, and blue source blending factors are computed. Source and destination parameters must be one of the following symbolic constants: - ZERO - ONE - SRC_COLOR - ONE_MINUS_SRC_COLOR - DST_COLOR - ONE_MINUS_DST_COLOR - SRC_ALPHA - ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA - DST_ALPHA - ONE_MINUS_DST_ALPHA - CONSTANT_COLOR - ONE_MINUS_CONSTANT_COLOR - CONSTANT_ALPHA - ONE_MINUS_CONSTANT_ALPHA

field.name: sourceAlphaFactor
field.description: Specifies how the alpha source blending factors are computed.

field.name: destinationColorFactor
field.description: Specifies how the red, green, and blue destination blending factors are computed.

field.name: destinationAlphaFactor
field.description: Specifies how the alpha destination blending factors are computed.

field.name: colorEquation
field.description: Specifies the RGB blend equation, how the red, green, and blue components of the source and destination colors are combined. It must be: - FUNC_ADD - FUNC_SUBTRACT - FUNC_REVERSE_SUBTRACT

field.name: alphaEquation
field.description: Specifies the alpha blend equation, how the alpha component of the source and destination colors are combined. It must be: - FUNC_ADD - FUNC_SUBTRACT - FUNC_REVERSE_SUBTRACT

InterfaceDefinition.appinfo: Overview ClearcoatMaterialExtension is an extension for the [PhysicalMaterial](../../shape/physicalmaterial/) and [SpecularGlossinessMaterial](../specularglossinessmaterial/) nodes. For this node to have an effect, add an [EnvironmentLight](../../lighting/environmentlight) node. The ClearcoatMaterialExtension node belongs to the **X_ITE** component and requires at least level **1,** its default container field is *extensions.* It is available from X3D version 4.0 or higher. **Info:** Please note that this node is still **experimental**, i.e. the functionality of this node may change in future versions of X_ITE.

field.name: metadata
field.description: Information about this node can be contained in a [MetadataBoolean](/x_ite/components/core/metadataboolean/), [MetadataDouble](/x_ite/components/core/metadatadouble/), [MetadataFloat](/x_ite/components/core/metadatafloat/), [MetadataInteger](/x_ite/components/core/metadatainteger/), [MetadataString](/x_ite/components/core/metadatastring/) or [MetadataSet](/x_ite/components/core/metadataset/) node.

field.name: clearcoat
field.description: The clearcoat layer intensity.

field.name: clearcoatTextureMapping
field.description: Input/Output field *clearcoatTextureMapping*.

field.name: clearcoatTexture
field.description: The clearcoat layer intensity texture.

field.name: clearcoatRoughness
field.description: The clearcoat layer roughness.

field.name: clearcoatRoughnessTextureMapping
field.description: Input/Output field *clearcoatRoughnessTextureMapping*.

field.name: clearcoatRoughnessTexture
field.description: The clearcoat layer roughness texture.

field.name: clearcoatNormalTextureMapping
field.description: Input/Output field *clearcoatNormalTextureMapping*.

field.name: clearcoatNormalTexture
field.description: The clearcoat normal map texture.

InterfaceDefinition.appinfo: Overview DepthMode contains parameters that are specific for depth control, like the value used for depth buffer comparisons. The DepthMode node belongs to the **X_ITE** component and its default container field is *depthMode.* It is available in X_ITE. **Info:** Please note that this node is still **experimental**, i.e. the functionality of this node may change in future versions of X_ITE.

field.name: metadata
field.description: Information about this node can be contained in a [MetadataBoolean](/x_ite/components/core/metadataboolean/), [MetadataDouble](/x_ite/components/core/metadatadouble/), [MetadataFloat](/x_ite/components/core/metadatafloat/), [MetadataInteger](/x_ite/components/core/metadatainteger/), [MetadataString](/x_ite/components/core/metadatastring/) or [MetadataSet](/x_ite/components/core/metadataset/) node.

field.name: polygonOffset
field.description: Specifies the scale factors and units to calculate depth values. The offset is added before the depth test is performed and before the value is written into the depth buffer. The first value is *factor*, a GLfloat which sets the scale factor for the variable depth offset for each polygon. The default value is 0. The second value is *units*, a GLfloat which sets the multiplier by which an implementation-specific value is multiplied with to create a constant depth offset. The default value is 0.

field.name: depthRange
field.description: Specifies the depth range mapping from normalized device coordinates to window or viewport coordinates. The first value is *zNear*, a GLclampf specifying the mapping of the near clipping plane to window or viewport coordinates. Clamped to the range 0 to 1 and must be less than or equal to zFar. The default value is 0. The second value is *zFar*, a GLclampf specifying the mapping of the far clipping plane to window or viewport coordinates. Clamped to the range 0 to 1. The default value is 1.

field.name: depthTest
field.description: Activates depth comparisons and updates to the depth buffer.

field.name: depthFunction
field.description: Specifies a function that compares incoming pixel depth to the current depth buffer value. Must be one of the following symbolic constants: * NEVER * LESS * EQUAL * LESS_EQUAL * GREATER * NOT_EQUAL * GREATER_EQUAL * ALWAYS

field.name: depthMask
field.description: Sets whether writing into the depth buffer is enabled or disabled.

InterfaceDefinition.appinfo: Overview DiffuseTransmissionMaterialExtension is an extension for the [PhysicalMaterial](../../shape/physicalmaterial/) and [SpecularGlossinessMaterial](../specularglossinessmaterial/) nodes. For this node to have an effect, add an [EnvironmentLight](../../lighting/environmentlight) node. The DiffuseTransmissionMaterialExtension node belongs to the **X_ITE** component and requires at least level **1,** its default container field is *extensions.* It is available from X3D version 4.0 or higher. **Info:** Please note that this node is still **experimental**, i.e. the functionality of this node may change in future versions of X_ITE.

field.name: metadata
field.description: Information about this node can be contained in a [MetadataBoolean](/x_ite/components/core/metadataboolean/), [MetadataDouble](/x_ite/components/core/metadatadouble/), [MetadataFloat](/x_ite/components/core/metadatafloat/), [MetadataInteger](/x_ite/components/core/metadatainteger/), [MetadataString](/x_ite/components/core/metadatastring/) or [MetadataSet](/x_ite/components/core/metadataset/) node.

field.name: diffuseTransmission
field.description: The percentage of reflected, non-specularly reflected light that is transmitted through the surface via the Lambertian diffuse transmission, i.e., the strength of the diffuse transmission effect.

field.name: diffuseTransmissionTextureMapping
field.description: Input/Output field *diffuseTransmissionTextureMapping*.

field.name: diffuseTransmissionTexture
field.description: A texture that defines the strength of the diffuse transmission effect, stored in the alpha (A) channel. Will be multiplied by the diffuseTransmissionFactor.

field.name: diffuseTransmissionColor
field.description: The color of the transmitted light.

field.name: diffuseTransmissionColorTextureMapping
field.description: Input/Output field *diffuseTransmissionColorTextureMapping*.

field.name: diffuseTransmissionColorTexture
field.description: A texture that defines the color of the transmitted light, stored in the RGB channels and encoded in sRGB. This texture will be multiplied by diffuseTransmissionColorFactor.

InterfaceDefinition.appinfo: Overview DispersionMaterialExtension is an extension for the [PhysicalMaterial](../../shape/physicalmaterial/) and [SpecularGlossinessMaterial](../specularglossinessmaterial/) nodes. For this node to have an effect, add an [EnvironmentLight](../../lighting/environmentlight) node. The DispersionMaterialExtension node belongs to the **X_ITE** component and requires at least level **1,** its default container field is *extensions.* It is available from X3D version 4.0 or higher. **Info:** Please note that this node is still **experimental**, i.e. the functionality of this node may change in future versions of X_ITE.

field.name: metadata
field.description: Information about this node can be contained in a [MetadataBoolean](/x_ite/components/core/metadataboolean/), [MetadataDouble](/x_ite/components/core/metadatadouble/), [MetadataFloat](/x_ite/components/core/metadatafloat/), [MetadataInteger](/x_ite/components/core/metadatainteger/), [MetadataString](/x_ite/components/core/metadatastring/) or [MetadataSet](/x_ite/components/core/metadataset/) node.

field.name: dispersion
field.description: The strength of the dispersion effect, specified as 20/Abbe number.

InterfaceDefinition.appinfo: Overview EmissiveStrengthMaterialExtension is an extension for the [PhysicalMaterial](../../shape/physicalmaterial/) and [SpecularGlossinessMaterial](../specularglossinessmaterial/) nodes. The EmissiveStrengthMaterialExtension node belongs to the **X_ITE** component and requires at least level **1,** its default container field is *extensions.* It is available from X3D version 4.0 or higher. **Info:** Please note that this node is still **experimental**, i.e. the functionality of this node may change in future versions of X_ITE.

field.name: metadata
field.description: Information about this node can be contained in a [MetadataBoolean](/x_ite/components/core/metadataboolean/), [MetadataDouble](/x_ite/components/core/metadatadouble/), [MetadataFloat](/x_ite/components/core/metadatafloat/), [MetadataInteger](/x_ite/components/core/metadatainteger/), [MetadataString](/x_ite/components/core/metadatastring/) or [MetadataSet](/x_ite/components/core/metadataset/) node.

field.name: emissiveStrength
field.description: The strength adjustment to be multiplied with the material's emissive value. strength of the dispersion effect, specified as 20/Abbe number.

InterfaceDefinition.appinfo: Overview InstancedShape can appear under any grouping node. InstancedShape can contain an Appearance node and a geometry node (for example one of the primitives Box Cone Cylinder Sphere Text, one of ElevationGrid Extrusion IndexedFaceSet IndexedLineSet LineSet PointSet, or one of the other geometry nodes) and this geometry node is instantiated as often as transformations are provided. The InstancedShape node belongs to the **X_ITE** component and its default container field is *children.* It is available in X_ITE. **Info:** Please note that this node is still **experimental**, i.e. the functionality of this node may change in future versions of X_ITE.

field.name: metadata
field.description: Information about this node can be contained in a [MetadataBoolean](/x_ite/components/core/metadataboolean/), [MetadataDouble](/x_ite/components/core/metadatadouble/), [MetadataFloat](/x_ite/components/core/metadatafloat/), [MetadataInteger](/x_ite/components/core/metadatainteger/), [MetadataString](/x_ite/components/core/metadatastring/) or [MetadataSet](/x_ite/components/core/metadataset/) node.

field.name: translations
field.description: Input/Output field *translations*.

field.name: rotations
field.description: Input/Output field *rotations*.

field.name: scales
field.description: Input/Output field *scales*.

field.name: scaleOrientations
field.description: Input/Output field *scaleOrientations*.

field.name: centers
field.description: Input/Output field *centers*.

field.name: pointerEvents
field.description: *pointerEvents* defines whether this Shape becomes target for pointer events.

field.name: castShadow
field.description: Input/Output field *castShadow*.

field.name: visible
field.description: Whether or not renderable content within this node is visually displayed.

field.name: bboxDisplay
field.description: Whether to display bounding box for associated geometry, aligned with world coordinates.

field.name: bboxSize
field.description: Bounding box size is usually omitted, and can easily be calculated automatically by an X3D player at scene-loading time with minimal computational cost. Bounding box size can also be defined as an optional authoring hint that suggests an optimization or constraint.

field.name: bboxCenter
field.description: Bounding box center accompanies bboxSize and provides an optional hint for bounding box position offset from origin of local coordinate system.

field.name: appearance
field.description: Input/Output field *appearance*.

field.name: geometry
field.description: Input/Output field *geometry*.

InterfaceDefinition.appinfo: Overview IORMaterialExtension is an extension for the [PhysicalMaterial](../../shape/physicalmaterial/) and [SpecularGlossinessMaterial](../specularglossinessmaterial/) nodes. For this node to have an effect, add an [EnvironmentLight](../../lighting/environmentlight) node. The IORMaterialExtension node belongs to the **X_ITE** component and requires at least level **1,** its default container field is *extensions.* It is available from X3D version 4.0 or higher. **Info:** Please note that this node is still **experimental**, i.e. the functionality of this node may change in future versions of X_ITE.

field.name: metadata
field.description: Information about this node can be contained in a [MetadataBoolean](/x_ite/components/core/metadataboolean/), [MetadataDouble](/x_ite/components/core/metadatadouble/), [MetadataFloat](/x_ite/components/core/metadatafloat/), [MetadataInteger](/x_ite/components/core/metadatainteger/), [MetadataString](/x_ite/components/core/metadatastring/) or [MetadataSet](/x_ite/components/core/metadataset/) node.

field.name: indexOfRefraction
field.description: The index of refraction.

InterfaceDefinition.appinfo: Overview IridescenceMaterialExtension is an extension for the [PhysicalMaterial](../../shape/physicalmaterial/) and [SpecularGlossinessMaterial](../specularglossinessmaterial/) nodes. For this node to have an effect, add an [EnvironmentLight](../../lighting/environmentlight) node. The IridescenceMaterialExtension node belongs to the **X_ITE** component and requires at least level **1,** its default container field is *extensions.* It is available from X3D version 4.0 or higher. **Info:** Please note that this node is still **experimental**, i.e. the functionality of this node may change in future versions of X_ITE.

field.name: metadata
field.description: Information about this node can be contained in a [MetadataBoolean](/x_ite/components/core/metadataboolean/), [MetadataDouble](/x_ite/components/core/metadatadouble/), [MetadataFloat](/x_ite/components/core/metadatafloat/), [MetadataInteger](/x_ite/components/core/metadatainteger/), [MetadataString](/x_ite/components/core/metadatastring/) or [MetadataSet](/x_ite/components/core/metadataset/) node.

field.name: iridescence
field.description: The iridescence intensity factor.

field.name: iridescenceTextureMapping
field.description: Input/Output field *iridescenceTextureMapping*.

field.name: iridescenceTexture
field.description: The iridescence intensity texture.

field.name: iridescenceIndexOfRefraction
field.description: The index of refraction of the dielectric thin-film layer.

field.name: iridescenceThicknessMinimum
field.description: The minimum thickness of the thin-film layer given in nanometers.

field.name: iridescenceThicknessMaximum
field.description: The maximum thickness of the thin-film layer given in nanometers.

field.name: iridescenceThicknessTextureMapping
field.description: Input/Output field *iridescenceThicknessTextureMapping*.

field.name: iridescenceThicknessTexture
field.description: The thickness texture of the thin-film layer.

InterfaceDefinition.appinfo: Overview SheenMaterialExtension is an extension for the [PhysicalMaterial](../../shape/physicalmaterial/) and [SpecularGlossinessMaterial](../specularglossinessmaterial/) nodes. For this node to have an effect, add an [EnvironmentLight](../../lighting/environmentlight) node. The SheenMaterialExtension node belongs to the **X_ITE** component and requires at least level **1,** its default container field is *extensions.* It is available from X3D version 4.0 or higher. **Info:** Please note that this node is still **experimental**, i.e. the functionality of this node may change in future versions of X_ITE.

field.name: metadata
field.description: Information about this node can be contained in a [MetadataBoolean](/x_ite/components/core/metadataboolean/), [MetadataDouble](/x_ite/components/core/metadatadouble/), [MetadataFloat](/x_ite/components/core/metadatafloat/), [MetadataInteger](/x_ite/components/core/metadatainteger/), [MetadataString](/x_ite/components/core/metadatastring/) or [MetadataSet](/x_ite/components/core/metadataset/) node.

field.name: sheenColor
field.description: The sheen color in linear space.

field.name: sheenColorTextureMapping
field.description: Input/Output field *sheenColorTextureMapping*.

field.name: sheenColorTexture
field.description: The sheen color (RGB). The sheen color is in sRGB transfer function.

field.name: sheenRoughness
field.description: The sheen roughness.

field.name: sheenRoughnessTextureMapping
field.description: Input/Output field *sheenRoughnessTextureMapping*.

field.name: sheenRoughnessTexture
field.description: The sheen roughness (Alpha) texture.

InterfaceDefinition.appinfo: Overview SpecularGlossinessMaterial specifies surface rendering properties for associated geometry nodes. Material attributes are used by the X3D lighting equations during rendering. The SpecularGlossinessMaterial node belongs to the **X_ITE** component and requires at least level **1,** its default container field is *material.* It is available from X3D version 4.0 or higher. **Info:** Please note that this node is still **experimental**, i.e. the functionality of this node may change in future versions of X_ITE. **Deprecated:** This node is **deprecated** as of X3D version 4.0. Future versions of the standard may remove this node. Please use [PhysicalMaterial](/x_ite/components/shape/physicalmaterial/) instead. {: .prompt-danger }

field.name: metadata
field.description: Information about this node can be contained in a [MetadataBoolean](/x_ite/components/core/metadataboolean/), [MetadataDouble](/x_ite/components/core/metadatadouble/), [MetadataFloat](/x_ite/components/core/metadatafloat/), [MetadataInteger](/x_ite/components/core/metadatainteger/), [MetadataString](/x_ite/components/core/metadatastring/) or [MetadataSet](/x_ite/components/core/metadataset/) node.

field.name: diffuseColor
field.description: The reflected diffuse factor of the material.

field.name: diffuseTextureMapping
field.description: Input/Output field *diffuseTextureMapping*.

field.name: diffuseTexture
field.description: The diffuse texture.

field.name: specularColor
field.description: The specular RGB color of the material.

field.name: glossiness
field.description: The glossiness or smoothness of the material.

field.name: specularGlossinessTextureMapping
field.description: Input/Output field *specularGlossinessTextureMapping*.

field.name: specularGlossinessTexture
field.description: The specular-glossiness texture.

field.name: emissiveColor
field.description: How much glowing light is emitted from this object.

field.name: emissiveTextureMapping
field.description: The mapping label identifies which texture coordinates and transformations are used to compute texture effects from corresponding geometry on a given material.

field.name: emissiveTexture
field.description: When applying emissiveColor for this material node, the contained texture provides Physically Based Rendering (PBR) modulation for each pixel.

field.name: occlusionStrength
field.description: *occlusionStrength* indicates areas of indirect lighting, typically called ambient occlusion. Higher values indicate areas that should receive full indirect lighting and lower values indicate no indirect lighting.

field.name: occlusionTextureMapping
field.description: The mapping label identifies which texture coordinates and transformations are used to compute texture effects from corresponding geometry on a given material.

field.name: occlusionTexture
field.description: When applying occlusionStrength for this material node, the contained texture provides Physically Based Rendering (PBR) modulation for each pixel.

field.name: normalScale
field.description: *normalScale* controls the degree to which normalTexture RGB values apply XYZ-normal bump mapping to pixels in the parent material.

field.name: normalTextureMapping
field.description: The mapping label identifies which texture coordinates and transformations are used to compute texture effects from corresponding geometry on a given material.

field.name: normalTexture
field.description: When applying normalScale for this material node, the contained texture modulates the texture across the surface.

field.name: transparency
field.description: How 'clear' an object is: 1.0 is completely transparent, 0.0 is completely opaque. Interchange profile

field.name: extensions
field.description: Input/Output field *extensions*.

InterfaceDefinition.appinfo: Overview SpecularMaterialExtension is an extension for the [PhysicalMaterial](../../shape/physicalmaterial/) and [SpecularGlossinessMaterial](../specularglossinessmaterial/) nodes. For this node to have an effect, add an [EnvironmentLight](../../lighting/environmentlight) node. The SpecularMaterialExtension node belongs to the **X_ITE** component and requires at least level **1,** its default container field is *extensions.* It is available from X3D version 4.0 or higher. **Info:** Please note that this node is still **experimental**, i.e. the functionality of this node may change in future versions of X_ITE.

field.name: metadata
field.description: Information about this node can be contained in a [MetadataBoolean](/x_ite/components/core/metadataboolean/), [MetadataDouble](/x_ite/components/core/metadatadouble/), [MetadataFloat](/x_ite/components/core/metadatafloat/), [MetadataInteger](/x_ite/components/core/metadatainteger/), [MetadataString](/x_ite/components/core/metadatastring/) or [MetadataSet](/x_ite/components/core/metadataset/) node.

field.name: specular
field.description: The strength of the specular reflection.

field.name: specularTextureMapping
field.description: Input/Output field *specularTextureMapping*.

field.name: specularTexture
field.description: texture that defines the strength of the specular reflection, stored in the alpha (A) channel. This will be multiplied by specularFactor.

field.name: specularColor
field.description: The F0 color of the specular reflection (linear RGB).

field.name: specularColorTextureMapping
field.description: Input/Output field *specularColorTextureMapping*.

field.name: specularColorTexture
field.description: A texture that defines the F0 color of the specular reflection, stored in the RGB channels and encoded in sRGB. This texture will be multiplied by specularColorFactor.

InterfaceDefinition.appinfo: Overview TransmissionMaterialExtension is an extension for the [PhysicalMaterial](../../shape/physicalmaterial/) and [SpecularGlossinessMaterial](../specularglossinessmaterial/) nodes. For this node to have an effect, add an [EnvironmentLight](../../lighting/environmentlight) node. The TransmissionMaterialExtension node belongs to the **X_ITE** component and requires at least level **1,** its default container field is *extensions.* It is available from X3D version 4.0 or higher. **Info:** Please note that this node is still **experimental**, i.e. the functionality of this node may change in future versions of X_ITE.

field.name: metadata
field.description: Information about this node can be contained in a [MetadataBoolean](/x_ite/components/core/metadataboolean/), [MetadataDouble](/x_ite/components/core/metadatadouble/), [MetadataFloat](/x_ite/components/core/metadatafloat/), [MetadataInteger](/x_ite/components/core/metadatainteger/), [MetadataString](/x_ite/components/core/metadatastring/) or [MetadataSet](/x_ite/components/core/metadataset/) node.

field.name: transmission
field.description: The base percentage of light that is transmitted through the surface.

field.name: transmissionTextureMapping
field.description: Input/Output field *transmissionTextureMapping*.

field.name: transmissionTexture
field.description: A texture that defines the transmission percentage of the surface, stored in the R channel. This will be multiplied by transmissionFactor.

InterfaceDefinition.appinfo: Overview VolumeMaterialExtension is an extension for the [PhysicalMaterial](../../shape/physicalmaterial/) and [SpecularGlossinessMaterial](../specularglossinessmaterial/) nodes. For this node to have an effect, add an [EnvironmentLight](../../lighting/environmentlight) node. The VolumeMaterialExtension node belongs to the **X_ITE** component and requires at least level **1,** its default container field is *extensions.* It is available from X3D version 4.0 or higher. **Info:** Please note that this node is still **experimental**, i.e. the functionality of this node may change in future versions of X_ITE.

field.name: metadata
field.description: Information about this node can be contained in a [MetadataBoolean](/x_ite/components/core/metadataboolean/), [MetadataDouble](/x_ite/components/core/metadatadouble/), [MetadataFloat](/x_ite/components/core/metadatafloat/), [MetadataInteger](/x_ite/components/core/metadatainteger/), [MetadataString](/x_ite/components/core/metadatastring/) or [MetadataSet](/x_ite/components/core/metadataset/) node.

field.name: thickness
field.description: The thickness of the volume beneath the surface. The value is given in the coordinate space of the mesh. If the value is 0 the material is thin-walled. Otherwise the material is a volume boundary. The doubleSided property has no effect on volume boundaries.

field.name: thicknessTextureMapping
field.description: Input/Output field *thicknessTextureMapping*.

field.name: thicknessTexture
field.description: A texture that defines the thickness, stored in the G channel. This will be multiplied by thicknessFactor.

field.name: attenuationDistance
field.description: Density of the medium given as the average distance that light travels in the medium before interacting with a particle. The value is given in world space.

field.name: attenuationColor
field.description: The color that white light turns into due to absorption when reaching the attenuation distance.
